thread.title_full: Shakespeare Theatre of NJ holds annual costume and prop sale - Theater - NorthJersey.com

author: The Record
title: Shakespeare Theatre of NJ holds annual costume and prop sale - Theater
text:
THEATER: Props, costumes on sale 
Just in time for Halloween, the Shakespeare Theatre of New Jersey will hold its annual costume, prop and scenery sale from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. today at 3 Vreeland Road in Florham Park. Fabric remnants, furniture and scenic elements from the theater’s stock will be for sale. All proceeds will benefit the company’s artistic and educational programs. Information: 973-408-5600 or shakespearenj.org. 
— Rebecca Rosenthal
